```{r message = FALSE}
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
status_invest <- read_html("https://statusinvest.com.br/acoes/busca-avancada")
```

```{r}
urls <- status_invest %>%
    read_html() %>%
    html_nodes(xpath = "//a[@href]") %>%
    html_attr(name = "href")

urls
```

```{r}
  html_table(fill = TRUE)
```
